Priest.I_need_the_mystic_gem: <01_Priest> We have no time to lose! My villagers are swiftly abandoning the faith. I need that bless?d relic to show them the light! </01_Priest>

Katarina.Katarinas_sin: <01_VH> I know that it was only the gem that made you open up, but should you ever want to discuss... your past, I'm here. </01_VH> <02_Katarina> What are you now, a priest? We should never touch such gems again. </02_Katarina>

guard.Be_careful_hunter: <01_Guard_falu> Be careful, hunter! That old battlefield is a dangerous place, even for people like you. </01_Guard_falu>

Pale_gentleman.Do_your_job: <01_Pale_gentleman> I'm getting impatient, hunter! Do what you promised to do, and I'll be grateful. </01_Pale_gentleman>
Pale_gentleman.This_is_mine_sewer1: <01_Pale_gentleman> This is my territory now, hunter. Leave immediately. </01_Pale_gentleman>
Pale_gentleman.This_is_mine_sewer2: <01_Pale_gentleman> Didn't you see that sign? No hunters allowed. </01_Pale_gentleman>
Pale_gentleman.This_is_mine_sewer3: <01_Pale_gentleman> This secret lair is too small for us, hunter. </01_Pale_gentleman>
Pale_gentleman.This_is_mine_sewer4: <01_Pale_gentleman> You had your chance to work for me. Please, leave now. </01_Pale_gentleman>

Rebel_soldier.I_dont_go_with_you1: <01_Rebel_soldier> I'd love to join you, but I took a strange elyctrical projectile in the knee. </01_Rebel_soldier>
Rebel_soldier.I_dont_go_with_you2: <01_Rebel_soldier> Good hunting! I mean, good hunting, sir! </01_Rebel_soldier>
Rebel_soldier.I_dont_go_with_you3: <01_Rebel_soldier> Don't worry, sir, I will guard this strategically important position. </01_Rebel_soldier>

Pale_gentleman_2.Do_your_job_2: <01_Pale_gentleman_2> Hurry up, hunter! We can't be late with the ritual. </01_Pale_gentleman_2>
